description:
Check updates for Android apps, Magisk modules and more! UpgradeAll is a free and open source software which simplifies the process of finding updates for Android apps (even if you didn't install them), Magisk modules and more. The main focus is on speed and ease of use, which is widely appreciated by users.

Features

  • Get updates from multiple sources.
  • Download files with external downloader.
  • Highly customizable rules.
  • Modern and clean design.
  • Support Android 5.0 to 12L.

App sources

  • Github
  • Gitlab
  • F-Droid
  • Play Store
  • Coolapk
  • and more

FAQ

You can find the FAQ and tutorials on GitHub Wiki.
